label: Kitchen Appliances and Cookware
description: Products and accessories for cooking and food preparation.

subcategories.label: Microwaves
subcategories.description: Small electric ovens used for heating and cooking food.

subcategories.description: Tools and utensils used for cooking and food preparation.

subcategories.label: Dinnerware

subcategories.label: Small Appliances

subcategories.label: Tableware

subcategories.label: Refrigeration
